title: Margot Machol Bisnow: "Raising An Entrepreneur"
description: Michael speaks with Margot Machol Bisnow, author of "Raising an Entrepreneur: How to Help Your Children Achieve Their Dreams - 99 Stories from Families Who Did." Original air date 28 July 2022. The book was published on 18 May 2022.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Michael Smerconish, Margot Machol Bisnow)
